title: Monarch beefs up winter schedule
text:
Monarch beefs up winter schedule 23 July 2015 Save 
Monarch Airlines will operate additional frequencies on certain routes this winter with city and ski destinations set to benefit. 
An additional flight from Gatwick to Salzburg will operate each Sunday from December 20 until March 20 while a Manchester Almeria route will see additional peak season flights on Mondays as well as Fridays. 
Birmingham will see an additional flight to Barcelona each Saturday while Luton will offer an extra flight to Alicante each Sunday. 
Marjan Schoeke, head of network development for Monarch Airlines said: “We are delighted to announce the release of additional frequencies to some of our popular city and ski destinations to our schedule for winter 15/16. 
“These additional frequencies including the extension of Almeria flights from Manchester through the winter season provide our customers with an even greater choice of destinations when it comes to booking their winter break.”
